description:
Dan has loved cars his entire life.
“Give me an old beater,” he said. “I’m in heaven!”
His passion is restoring old classics.
“I’m working on two of them now.”
He had a huge smile on his face!
“There’s something about a hopeless cause. I love getting in there. When you’re done the sense of accomplishment is amazing!”
He’s also a really sweet guy and a bit of a romantic.
“I love to cook,” he said. “There’s nothing better than a nice, quiet dinner at home... for two!”
title: Dan
